Modifications.Value: Transforms the hero into a powerful Flying Dragon with a frost attack and 1000/2000/3000 bonus hit points.In dragon form, increase the attack power of all Blue Dragons by 50%,health regeneration by 30,movement speed by 10%.  |nLasts 25/30/35 seconds.
